items.title: Vikas Kaushal appointed as HPCL's new chairman and managing director
items.description: This marks one of the rare cases where the government has chosen to appoint a private sector personnel to head a state-run agency

items.title: Mrs Bectors Food Specialities: Healthy earnings growth to resume from FY26
items.description: MBFSL is a quality FMCG company with good scope for market share gains and healthy earnings visibility. It is expanding capacity across product segments such as biscuits and bakery

items.title: Sundaram Finance: Growth steady, but rich valuation could limit stock upside
items.description: Sequential growth improved amid a difficult operating environment

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick – This beverage stock is grabbing opportunities, nailing execution
items.description: Seasonal tailwinds, improved mix, and expanding international presence to drive growth and margins

items.title: SEBI's role is maintaining the integrity of markets: Tuhin Kanta Pandey
items.description: Tuhin Kanta Pandey also reaffirmed SEBI’s commitment to investor protection and outlined plans to strengthen financial awareness through dedicated investor education programmes.
